stimulusHtml:
• Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes.

    Write an essay that:

    • Has a relevant thesis.

    • Addresses all parts of the question.

    • Supports thesis with specific evidence.

    • Is well organized.

Assess the extent to which the economic and political ideals of Karl Marx were realized in postrevolutionary Russia in the period from 1917 to 1939.
